Package fr.liglab.adele.icasa.device.manager

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ApplicationDevice
    Represents a device which is visible (can be used) by an application.
    ApplicationDeviceProxy
    Used to distinguish application device proxies from original icasa generic devices.
    AvailableDevice
    It represents an available device.
    DependRegistration
    Represents a specification of a device dependency which has been registered to the device manager.
    Device
    Describes a home device.
    DeviceExporter
    Allows a third party to export devices to another format.
    DeviceManager
    This service gives access to devices from digital services.
    FilterDeviceContrib
    Allows a component to filter devices in order to make them unavailable from applications.
    GlobalDeviceManager
    Internal device manager which can be used only by technical services.
    KnownDevice
    Represents a device which is known by the device manager.
    Operation
    Represents an operation which can be invoked from a service.
    OperationParameter
    Represents an operation parameter.
    ProvidedDevice
    All devices which provides this service will be discovered by the device manager.
    Service
    Represents a functionality of a resource.
    ServPropManager
    Allows an object to contribute to property management of a device proxy service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DetailedFault
    Represents details of a detected device fault.
    DeviceDependencies
    Allows to define a device dependency in a declarative way.
    DeviceDependency
    Represents a device dependency specification.
    DeviceProxy
    Represents a device proxy.
    DeviceRequest
    Represents a request for devices.
    DiscoveryRecord
    Represents a discovery record.
    ServiceRequest
    Represents an OSGi service request.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActivationState
    Represents a device activation state.
    Fault
    Represents a device fault.
    ParameterType
    Represents if a parameter is a
    VariableLifeCycle
    Represents the lifecycle of a variable.
